Title: Episode 4
Plot: Sam arrests the henchman of Stephen Warren, a local Mr Big, when he learns the whole of CID are on his payroll. Sam also visits his childhood home to interact with his mother (using name of "Bolan", a reference to the glam rock star Marc Bolan), who was being threatened by the landlord, one of Warren's men. Sam tries to help her by giving her some money and she mis-understands his gesture. When Sam tries to go all out after Warren, he finds himself in fix when Warren sets him up in a honey trap.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
GuestStars: Tony Marshall (III), Noreen Kershaw, Joanne Froggatt, William Matheson, Tom Mannion, Holly Mai Leighton, David Corden, Denton Brown, Chris Wilcox (III), Kelly Wenham, Stephen Aintree
